text: Grave Busters will devour a whole grave after 4 seconds.
$(br2)Grave Busters are cheap to make, requiring only one Sun and one Plant Food, but it will deal with any grave that you plant it on top of.
$(br2)At the start of the game, Graves will instantly vanish after spawning one group of zombies,
making Grave Buster useless, but at later stages, graves can stay up to 5 spawns before vanishing,
so Grave Buster is a good investment of sun for the amount of potential threats neutralised.
